KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords:
inner dot product math
support vector functions kernel

Function.Description: The vectorInnerProduct function returns the inner or dot product of the two Number Vector arguments x1 and x2.

Brief.Overview: The vectorInnerProduct function returns the inner or dot product of the two Number Vector arguments x1 and x2.
Brief.Usage: The vectorInnerProduct function may be used as a kernel for support vector machine regression (see the svmRegression function).

Argument.Name: x1
Argument.Note: The first Number Vector to be multiplied

Argument.Name: x2
Argument.Note: The second Number Vector to be multiplied

Syntax.Return: The inner or dot product of the two vectors.
